issue.message: Using `setJavaScriptEnabled` can introduce XSS vulnerabilities into your application, review carefully
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details

The image `ic_launcher.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: mipmap-hdpi/ic_launcher.png: 341x341 dp (512x512 px), mipmap-mdpi/ic_launcher.png: 512x512 dp (512x512 px), mipmap-xhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 256x256 dp (512x512 px), mipmap-xxhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 171x171 dp (512x512 px), mipmap-xxxhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 128x128 dp (512x512 px)
The `ic_launcher.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: mipmap-hdpi, mipmap-mdpi, mipmap-xhdpi, mipmap-xxhdpi, mipmap-xxxhdpi
